actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To amend Public Law 85-745 to provide that a former President may not receive a monetary allowance thereunder except upon waiving the right to receive any other Government annuity or pension.

summary.text: Revises Federal law regarding monetary allowances for former Presidents to allow a former President to receive such an allowance only upon waiving the right to receive any other Government annuity or pension.

titles.title: To amend Public Law 85-745 to provide that a former President may not receive a monetary allowance thereunder except upon waiving the right to receive any other Government annuity or pension.
